error.no_homes: There are no homes linked to this tado account.

init.description: Fallback mode lets you choose when to fallback to Smart Schedule from your manual zone overlay. (NEXT_TIME_BLOCK:= Change at next Smart Schedule change; MANUAL:= Dont change until you cancel; TADO_DEFAULT:= Change based on your setting in Tado App).
init.title: Adjust Tado options.

set_climate_timer.name: Set climate timer
set_climate_timer.description: Turns on climate entities for a set time.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: Temperature to set climate entity to.

time_period.name: Time period
time_period.description: Choose this or Overlay. Set the time period for the change if you want to be specific. Alternatively use Overlay.

requested_overlay.name: Overlay
requested_overlay.description: Choose this or Time Period. Allows you to choose an overlay. MANUAL:=Overlay until user removes; NEXT_TIME_BLOCK:=Overlay until next timeblock; TADO_DEFAULT:=Overlay based on tado app setting.

set_water_heater_timer.name: Set water heater timer
set_water_heater_timer.description: Turns on water heater for a set time.

time_period.name: Time period
time_period.description: Set the time period for the boost.

set_climate_temperature_offset.name: Set climate temperature offset
set_climate_temperature_offset.description: Sets the temperature offset of climate entities.

offset.name: Offset
offset.description: Offset you would like (depending on your device).

deprecated_yaml_import_device_tracker.title: Tado YAML device tracker configuration imported
deprecated_yaml_import_device_tracker.description:
Configuring the Tado Device Tracker using YAML is being removed.
Remove the YAML device tracker configuration and restart Home Assistant.

import_aborted.title: Import aborted
import_aborted.description:
Configuring the Tado Device Tracker using YAML is being removed.
 The import was aborted, due to an existing config entry being the same as the data being imported in the YAML. Remove the YAML device tracker configuration and restart Home Assistant. Please use the UI to configure Tado.

import_failed.title: Failed to import
import_failed.description: Failed to import the configuration for the Tado Device Tracker. Please use the UI to configure Tado. Don't forget to delete the YAML configuration.

import_failed_invalid_auth.title: Failed to import, invalid credentials
import_failed_invalid_auth.description: Failed to import the configuration for the Tado Device Tracker, due to invalid credentials. Please fix the YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant. Alternatively you can use the UI to configure Tado. Don't forget to delete the YAML configuration, once the import is successful.
